Is the number you are thinking of greater than 50? (y/n)

Is the number you are thinking of greater than 13? (y/n)
Is the number you are thinking of greater than 7? (y/n)
Is the number you are thinking of greater than 4? (y/n)
Is the number you are thinking of greater than 2? (y/n)
Is the number you are thinking of greater than 1? (y/n)
The number you are thinking is 1
